name: api_change_license_ip_by_id
description: Change the IP on an active license.

function.name: api_change_license_ip_by_id
function.desc: Change the IP on an active license.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

example.status_text: This License either does not exist or it is not owned by you.

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param id int the old ip address
* @param newip string the new ip address
